title: Ahri, the Arcade 'Cat' with Nine Lives!!

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qp1E6yFE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-09T06:12:11.885+0000)
>
> nice spot! =D

Thanks! Just to add the fact that she dashed in from reality into a game showed in her recall animation, thus theres a 'screen' behind her which I thought was a really nice touch :D
